encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add lost.?lin at beginning and end; add modern diacriticals; delete erroneous blank space; l. 3-5 implement apparatus; l. 5 mark up ancient diacritical.
Submit - submitting the fragment. Modifications: divided and assigned a number to each line, copied the notes in apparatus and made explicit the lacunas at the end and beginning of the verses.

Commit - divided the text of the fragment in lines and numbered each, made visible that we have lacunas at the start and the end of every line, copied the annotations in apparatus. It was not possible to intervene on greek language because i never studied it
